reviews.review_msg: Good prof. Exams questions match the lectures but are more like 305 than 306. Go to lectures and to office hours.

Dr. Doesburg is very informative and I enjoyed his lectures. The second half of this course is very complicated so I don't think that's his fault. His pacing is good, it leaves me enough time to jot down important notes. Whenever I ask him a question, he answers directly and clearly which I appreciate!

Reads off the slides. Im basically falling asleep in class. He doesnt really explain topics that well. He goes off topic quite often. Also talks very quick which makes it hard to get notes down and we get off class 8-10 mins earlier than normal. Wished he would use that time to break down more complex topics.
